---
title: "Revista Némesis"
subtitle: "¡Bienvenido/a a la página de la revista estudiantil de la FACSO UChile!"

lang: es

# This enables the "magazine" grid layout
listing:
  - id: product
    contents: product
    type: grid               # <--- The Magazine Grid Look
    sort: 
      - "date desc"
      - "title"
    fields: [image, title, subtitle, author, date, reading-time]
    categories: false         
    sort-ui: false           
    filter-ui: false         
    page-size: 9             
    image-height: 250px      
    image-placeholder: "images/comentarios_dalle.png"
    exclude:
      category: "no_visualize"

# Reverting to the valid 'marquee' template
about: 
  template: marquee        
  image: images/header.jpg
  image-shape: rectangle
  image-width: 100%          
  links:                     
    - icon: newspaper
      text: "Leer última publicación"
      href: product/columnas.qmd
    - icon: pencil
      text: "Enviar artículo"
      href: normas_autores.qmd

page-layout: full
title-block-banner: true     
---

::: {#product}
:::
